Reviews.Title: “What can you expect for £50 per night”
Reviews.Author: kerry1274
Reviews.Content: ive read lots bad reviews hotel nervous staying eve hotel price range pleasently surprised beds comfortable manager happy supply extra pillows size fridge tight clean shower fine 5 min walk green station distict line perfect london tourist stay ok ritz wouldnt £50

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, but even cheap should be clean”
Reviews.Author: Michelle N
Reviews.Content: cheap location yes cant fault arrive fallen leaving otel omen cheap shouldnt water damaged floor floor front water damaged sagged black spots hasnt vacuumed didnt socks time bed clean ish sheets bit warm stains top blanket woke rash bathroom passable dont fit shower head impossible clean self hear noise weird smell owner lots cash cooks wardrobe shelves fell apart clothing cheap

Reviews.Title: “One Night Stay at Chiswick Court”
Reviews.Author: roger-lfc
Reviews.Content: hotel booked basis price location â£60 4 single beds bus stop 94 route tube station green inside zone 2 â£15 party 4 staying night football match arrival issued 12 little cramped fridge tv didnt bed linen indeed drab clean en suite showertoiletsink clean appearance mould starting appear bottom shower curtain radiators hot warm overnight breakfast consisted toast teacoffee orange juice juice appeared watered checkout 1030am exactly expected â£15 recommend hotel budget

Reviews.Title: “Yep, it's budget all the way around”
Reviews.Author: zanylady99
Reviews.Content: convenient location walking distance restaurants pubs grocery stores thats plus tired worn drapes hanging kilter funky bedspreads breakfast toast juice eat lucky didnt dirty bathroom fixtures water temps etc adequate searched time settling fit budget spoiled irish bs chiswick calling bb misnomer convenient london pay exorbitant rates bed try time cough pounds nicer
